subject: Re: Colorscapes page
preview: Hi Criselda,  Sorry for the button not functioning, I was doing some test for the scrolling effect when click. I'll update you shortly.   Regarding the buttons styling it seems that the page is cached

full_threads.body:
Hi Criselda,

Sorry for the button not functioning, I was doing some test for the scrolling effect when click. I'll update you shortly.

Regarding the buttons styling it seems that the page is cached.

Hi Joel,

Just noticed that the button below is not functioning now. We have an email going out in about 30 minutes that leads to this landing page, if it can't be fixed by then, better to hide this button first. Thanks



Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com

Hi Joel

FYI the button is appearing correctly now in the front end.



Just need your help with how it scrolls when you click the links below



Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com

Hi Joel,

Got it. Will keep that in mind when creating a new page.

How do you make the link go the specific section within the page right away without the fast-scrolling effect?

Also, tried adding a down button to the header but the styling doesn't reflect in the front end.





https://acoufelt.com.au/2025-filasorb-colorscapes/

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

Awesome, we will keep an eye on those pages.

My suggestion would be when creating a new page, instead of cloning/duplicate an existing page, try creating a new one and recreate the elements. There was a change with how the sections are created between the old version elementor and new version of elementor, there could be a conflict of the existing data and the new data (just a personal theory).

Hi Joel

Projects pages are working fine now. I'll reach out if issue persists.

Saw the new page that you recreated and was able to save my work now but there are some elements that seem to be missing.

What can be done to prevent that server 500 error from happening?

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com

Sure, can you try now? we have disabled wprocket for now.
